制.definition: system; to control; to regulate; variant of 製|制[zhi4]

制伏.definition: to overpower; to overwhelm; to subdue; to check; to control

制勝.definition: to win; to prevail; to come out on top

制導.definition: to control (the course of sth); to guide (a missile)

制度.definition: system (e.g. political, adminstrative etc); institution; CL:個|个[ge4]

制式.definition: standardized; standard (service, method etc); regulation (clothing etc); formulaic; (telecommunications etc) system; format (e.g. the PAL or NTSC systems for TV signals)

制服.definition: to subdue; to check; to bring under control; (in former times) what one is allowed to wear depending on social status; uniform (army, party, school etc); livery (for company employees); CL:套[tao4]

制服呢.definition: (textiles) uniform coating; durable, warm fabric used for uniforms

制止.definition: to curb; to put a stop to; to stop; to check; to limit

制衡.definition: to check and balance (power); checks and balances

制錢.definition: copper coin of the Ming and Qing Dynasties

制霸.definition: to reign supreme; to dominate (orthographic borrowing from Japanese 制霸 "seiha")
